attributes.action: request that all MP's who were involved with abuse of the expenses system should resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Mp's including the PM who were involved in abusing or manipulating the expenses in any way should resign there positions as members of parliament with immediate effect. All should be made to repay all the money received. The inland revenue should investigate all MP's to ensure full tax has been paid on all expenses received by MP's.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept any petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
